net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

Class FujitsuVbByteWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.AbstractByteWriter
      • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.FujitsuVbByteWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IByteRecordWriter

    public class FujitsuVbByteWriter
extends AbstractByteWriter
    Writes Array of Bytes to a raw Fujitsu Cobol Variable Length file. A Fujitsu Variable Length file is stored as {RDW1}{Record1}{RDW1}{RDW2}{Record2}{RDW2}.... where
    • {rwd} (record-descriptor} is a 4 byte net record length (Little Endian)

    Files written by this class contains record~descriptor~words.

    Author:
    Jean-Francois Gagnon v69.1 Jean-Francois Gagnon supplied fix for RDW calculation
